desc: Manage your knowledge for work, study, and life.

documentEditor.autoSaveMessage: Document auto-saves, no manual save needed

deleteConfirm.content: This document will be deleted permanently and cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.

documentEditor.editorPlaceholder: Type document content, press / to open command menu

documentList.empty: No documents yet. Click the button above to create your first one.

empty: No files or folders have been uploaded yet.

home.subtitle: Welcome to your knowledge base. Start managing your documents here.

list.confirmRemoveKnowledgeBase: You are about to delete this knowledge base. The files within will not be deleted and will be moved to All Files. Once deleted, the knowledge base cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.
list.empty: Click <1>+</1> to add a knowledge base

networkError: Failed to retrieve the knowledge base. Please check your network connection and try again.

notSupportGuide.desc: The current deployment instance is in client database mode, and file management features are not available. Please switch to <1>server database deployment mode</1>, or use <3>LobeChat Cloud</3> directly.

allKind.desc: Supports mainstream file types, including common document formats like Word, PPT, Excel, PDF, TXT, as well as popular code files like JS and Python.
allKind.title: Multiple File Type Parsing

embeddings.desc: Utilizes high-performance vector models to vectorize text chunks, enabling semantic search of file content.
embeddings.title: Vector Semantics

repos.desc: Supports the creation of knowledge bases and allows the addition of different types of files, building your domain knowledge.
repos.title: Knowledge Base

notSupportGuide.title: The current deployment mode does not support file management

preview.unsupportedFileAndContact: This file format is not currently supported for online preview. If you have a request for previewing, feel free to <1>contact us</1>.

title: Knowledge Base
